```{r}
library(datapasta)

library(dplyr)
library(tibble)
library(tidyr)

```


```{r}

headings <- c("INDEX_CCAC",
              "INDEX_WIK",
              "year.of.issue",
              "date.of.issue",
              "title", 
              "works",
              "other artists",
              "recording.date", "recording.location",
              "label",
              "serial.number.mono", "serial.number.stereo",
              "notes",
              "CCAC_page"
              )

length(headings)

headings_tbl <- tibble(headings)

headings_tbl


```
